author: Pierce Moore <me@prex.io>
name: rex-app
description: Amazingly simple full-team cross-platform deployment of web applications of all shapes and sizes.

args.install: Install a new application based on the local rex.json
args.update: Updates the installed application's git repos and npm modules
args.show: Displays current application status, structure, and versions of all folders, modules, and dependencies.
args.verbose: See more detailed console logging during activity
